prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon with a cheerful demeanor and a fiery tail.
I want a bipedal Pokemon that combines the colors orange and yellow.
Generate a cute starter Pokemon that evolves into a powerful dragon-like creature.
Make a Pokemon with a round body, short limbs, and a flame on its tail.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to explore grassy areas and mountains.
Design a Pokemon characterized by its bright orange color and expressive face.
Give me a small fire Pokemon that has a friendly nature and enjoys adventure.

distinctive_features: Flame at the tip of the tail
Big eyes with a joyful expression
